stepAnswer: It means that 72% of the variation in the dependent variable (y) can be explained by the variation in the independent variable (x).
stepTitle: Explain what it means when a correlation has an r2 of $$0.72$$.
stepBody: Choose the answer from the following.
choices: It means that 72% of the variation in the dependent variable (y) can be explained by the variation in the independent variable (x).
It means that 72% of the distribution in the dependent variable (y) can be explained by the variation in the independent variable (x).
